abilities.title: Wise Counsel
abilities.text: At the start of this Unit's activation, choose another allied Galactic Republic Unit. Each character in the chosen Unit may . Then, if the chosen Unit was a Jedi , one character in this Unit may . Force Push Choose a character in this Unit and an enemy character within 3 of that character. The chosen enemy character is Pushed 3 away from the chosen allied character. Force-Enhanced Reflexes When a character in this Unit is targeted by an attack, this Unit may use this ability. After the attack is resolved, if the attack roll contained one or more results, the attacking character suffers . Guardians of the Republic When an allied Galactic Republic character Wounds an enemy Unit, after the effect is resolved, choose an allied Jedi Unit. One character in the chosen Unit may then . Additionally, once per Turn, when an allied Jedi Unit uses an or ability, if it is within 3 of a Wounded allied Unit, reduce the cost of that ability by .
